notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the grub2 SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 9.2. It addresses 13 CVEs: CVE-2023-4001, CVE-2024-45774, CVE-2024-45775, CVE-2024-45776, CVE-2024-45781, and 8 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: grub2 security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 9.2
